span.strong: Hot Springs Schools and all facilities will be closed through the remainder of the school year. Please check back often for more information on end of the year items such as Graduation, computer return, etc.
School Lunches Now Free to all children 18 and under.

hr.span: Click here for more information on Hot Springs Schools ability to now offer school lunch to all of our children, including ages 1 to 5.
